glsa.title: t1utils: Arbitrary code execution
glsa.synopsis: A buffer overflow in t1utils could result in execution of arbitrary code or Denial of Service.

background.p: t1utils is a collection of simple Type 1 font manipulation programs.

description.p: t1utils has a buffer overflow in the set_cs_start function in t1disasm.c.

impact.p: A remote attacker could cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted font file.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All t1utils users should upgrade to the latest version:
